entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Fourchu Head
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:49 AM AST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Rain showers or flurries. High plus 3 with temperature falling to minus 7 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain showers or flurries changing to flurries this afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. High plus 3 with temperature falling to minus 7 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 17 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 03 February 2023
